Quote.Author: Robert Duvall
Quote.QuoteValue: You have a little bit of feeling for everyone you play

Quote.Author: Robert Duvall
Quote.QuoteValue: There was nothing wrong with shouting at God

Quote.Author: Robert Duvall
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no big thing, but you make big things out of little things sometimes

Quote.Author: Robert Duvall
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I like about Argentina, they only cook with salt; that's it

Quote.Author: Robert Duvall
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a star is an agent's dream, not an actor's

Quote.Author: Robert Duvall
Quote.QuoteValue: You just can't take a crash course to be a tango dancer in a movie

Quote.Author: Robert Duvall
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to do things that I develop from the ground up

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Obedience to lawful authority is the foundation of manly character

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: Never do a wrong thing to make a friend or to keep one

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: It is good that war is so horrible, or we might grow to like it

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: We failed, but in the good providence of God apparent failure often proves a blessing

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: The education of a man is never completed until he dies

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I like whiskey. I always did, and that is why I never drink it

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: You must study to be frank with the world: Frankness is the child of honesty and courage

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: What a cruel thing war is... to fill our hearts with hatred instead of love for our neighbors

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: My chief concern is to try to be an humble, earnest Christian

Quote.Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: The devil's name is dullness

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: The solution to alone-ness is not more solitude, but companionship and community

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: All I really need to know... I learned in kindergarten

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: Sticks and stones will break our bones, but words will break our hearts

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: The examined life is no picnic

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: Play fair. Don't hit people. Say you're sorry when you hurt somebody

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always thought anyone can make money. Making a life worth living, that's the real test

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: Clean up your own mess

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: Share everything. Don't take things that aren't yours. Put things back where you found them

Quote.Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote.QuoteValue: To be human is to keep rattling the bars of the cage of existence, hollering, 'What's it for?'

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: At a certain point, you have to face the fact that you've turned into an old fart

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: Like all editors, I assume, I'm a reactor

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: Increasingly, editing means going to lunch. It means editing with a credit card, not with a pencil

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: The first movement ballerina should be a paradigm of strength and authority

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: Most famous stage actors tactfully fade away

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: Blood is the leitmotif of 'Black Swan.'

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: The Iron Curtain may be a thing of the past, but Mother Russia is as mysterious as ever

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: When you can't follow a ballet's action, you can always read the program notes

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: How the English love playing at being naughty boys!

Quote.Author: Robert Gottlieb
Quote.QuoteValue: When December comes, can 'The Nutcracker' be far behind? No, it can't - not in America, anyway

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: In the presence of eternity, the mountains are as transient as the clouds

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is the only bee that makes honey without flowers

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness is the sunshine in which virtue grows

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: In nature there are neither rewards nor punishments; there are consequences

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Tolerance is giving to every other human being every right that you claim for yourself

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom believes in education - the salvation of slavery is ignorance

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the inferior of any man whose rights I trample under foot

Quote.Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather live and love where death is king than have eternal life where love is not

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Tough times never last, but tough people do

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone can count the seeds in an apple, but only God can count the number of apples in a seed

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Never underestimate your problem or your ability to deal with it

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: When you can't solve the problem, manage it

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Goals are not only absolutely necessary to motivate us. They are essential to really keep us alive

Quote.Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence comes from discipline and training

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Inside of every problem lies an opportunity

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is what you learn after you leave school

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Face your fears and doubts, and new worlds will open to you

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: French fries kill more people than guns and sharks, yet nobody's afraid of French fries

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that one key to success is to accept truth, no matter how it's spoken

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say raising capital is one of the weakest things for most entrepreneurs

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to look for teachers. If you want to be a mechanic, go hang out with mechanics

Quote.Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote.QuoteValue: History reminds us that dictators and despots arise during times of severe economic crisis

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Absences are a good influence in love and keep it bright and delicate

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Wine is bottled poetry

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is a gift you give yourself

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but of playing a poor hand well

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Devil, can sometimes do a very gentlemanly thing

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: All human beings are commingled out of good and evil

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: That man is a success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life

Quote.Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote.QuoteValue: To be what we are, and to become what we are capable of becoming, is the only end of life

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: The only Zen you can find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: Boredom always precedes a period of great creativity

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: Quality is a direct experience independent of and prior to intellectual abstractions

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: Quality is the Buddha

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: Metaphysics is a restaurant where they give you a thirty thousand page menu, and no food

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in the presence of others he was completely alone

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: We keep passing unseen through little moments of other people's lives

Quote.Author: Robert M. Pirsig
Quote.QuoteValue: When somebody goes outside the cultural norms, the culture has to protect itself

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaking of classified material is a concern

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: There'll be differences of opinion in just about every intelligence analysis that you make

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: In planning an attack, persons have various roles

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: So there is a foreign intelligence purpose for every one of our FISA warrants

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: I think around the world, our agents are the best collectors of information you'll find

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: Perimeter defense may not matter if the enemy is inside the gates

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved investigations

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: My admonition is, 'No counterterrorism lead goes uncovered.'

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: I still have to work on patience

Quote.Author: Robert Mueller
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot turn back the clock. We cannot undo the impact of technology. Nor would we want to

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't mind having sanctions banning us from Europe. We are not Europeans

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: The white man is not indigenous to Africa. Africa is for Africans. Zimbabwe is for Zimbabweans

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not hungry... Why foist this food upon us? We don't want to be choked. We have enough

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: We are no longer going to ask for the land, but we are going to take it without negotiating

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: It may be necessary to use methods other than constitutional ones

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: Our party must continue to strike fear in the heart of the white man, our real enemy!

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: I have died many times. I have actually beaten Jesus Christ because he only died once

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: So, Blair keep your England, and let me keep my Zimbabwe

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: There are things one must do for oneself

Quote.Author: Robert Mugabe
Quote.QuoteValue: Stay with us, please remain in this country and constitute a nation based on national unity

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: A vacation is having nothing to do and all day to do it in

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: Time flies. It's up to you to be the navigator

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: With my luck, if I ever invested in General Motors, they'd bust it to Corporal!

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: Do your kids a favor - don't have any

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't think of it as failure. Think of it as time-released success

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: I take my children everywhere, but they always find their way back home

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: Never raise your hand to your children - it leaves your midsection unprotected

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: To err is human - and to blame it on a computer is even more so

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people would like to be delivered from temptation but would like it to keep in touch

Quote.Author: Robert Orben
Quote.QuoteValue: Older people shouldn't eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is for every single person that walks the planet

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: We are trying to communicate a fulfilled ideal. Does anybody remember laughter?

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a flowerchild or anything like that... whatever it was

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: Old men do it better. We're not so sensitive in certain areas

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been scared and I've liked not hanging on to stuff where I know that I'm in my comfort zone

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: The past is a stepping stone, not a millstone

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't moan about any of it. I had a great time in the goldfish bowl

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, people can't fall in love with me just because I'm good at what I do

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: Does anyone remember laughter?

Quote.Author: Robert Plant
Quote.QuoteValue: I can find my way from 500 A.D. through to 1066 pretty well as an amateur historian

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, nobody told me I was good-looking. I wish they had. I would've had a better time

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a facelift person. I am what I am

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: Health food may be good for the conscience but Oreos taste a hell of a lot better

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: Never revisit the past, that's dangerous. You know, move on

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: Sundance was started as a mechanism for the discovery of new voices and new talent

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: Ambiguity is something that I really respond to. I like the complexity of it

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: Be careful of success; it has a dark side

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: Storytelling is important. Part of human continuity

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: I think independent filmmakers, documentary filmmakers - they are journalists

Quote.Author: Robert Redford
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a lawyer, but I do know this: we need to protect our ability to tell controversial stories

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: Average working people need more fresh starts. Big corporations, banks, and Donald Trump need fewer

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: Centrism is bogus

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't create a political movement out of pabulum

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't inspire people if you are going to be uninspiring

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: Globalization and free trade do spur economic growth, and they lead to lower prices on many goods

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: America is one of few advanced nations that allow direct advertising of prescription drugs

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many young people graduate laden with debts that take years, if not decades, to pay off

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: What someone is paid has little or no relationship to what their work is worth to society

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: Standing up to bullies is the hallmark of a civilized society

Quote.Author: Robert Reich
Quote.QuoteValue: Corporations aren't people. They have no brains, no consciences, no capacity for intent or guilt

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If you feel alienated from people around you, it's because no one tries to understand you

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I lose myself in music because I can't be bothered explaining what I feel to anyone else around me

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're on stage, the real world just drops away for that time. It's pretty intense

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I could write songs as bad as Wham's if I really felt the urge to, but what's the point?

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the rock'n'roll myth of living on the edge is a pile of crap

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: They may not like us, but they can't get away from knowing who we are

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather spend my time looking at the sky than listening to Whitney Houston

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If any of our songs ever did make it on the top ten, I'd disband the group immediately

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of death in a romantic way anymore

Quote.Author: Robert Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading is something I've really missed, not being able to enter people's worlds

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you slow things down, you notice things you hadn't seen before

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The landscape of Texas is in all my work. It's that light; it's that sky

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people are looking for an alternative to the fast pace of everyday life and entertainment

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: My method is much like choreography. I don't sit at a table. I work in a room with people

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: My work has always dealt with a kind of space that allows one to daydream

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Light is architectural. It is sculptural

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: When we look back at the Mayans or ancient Egypt, we look at their art

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If we lose our culture, we lose our memory

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: My theater is slow and calm, yet my life is fast and hectic, going in all directions

Quote.Author: Robert Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I start any work the same way. I start a rehearsal with silence

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, Fellini was like a watermelon. It is there. A watermelon cannot die

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a sign of mediocrity when you demonstrate gratitude with moderation

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Divine Comedy' is very sophisticated but also very popular

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: My duty is to try to reach beauty. Cinema is emotion. When you laugh you cry

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: Stanley Kubrick is one of the geniuses of this century

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: To be in front of an audience and pretending, and to lie, this is the principle of acting

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Tiger And The Snow' is a beautiful movie. I am in love with this idea

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe sometimes I have been wrong with some movies. Anyway, I try to do my best

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: I am like a cartoon strip; I am like Donald Duck; everybody knows me in Italy

Quote.Author: Roberto Benigni
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that sometimes only comedians can reach the peaks of tragedy

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: The eye sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: A happy childhood has spoiled many a promising life

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: Their very conservatism is secondhand, and they don't know what they are conserving

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: If we seek the pleasures of love, passion should be occasional, and common sense continual

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of truth lies at the root of much humor

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: The most original thing a writer can do is write like himself. It is also his most difficult task

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: No people in the world can make you feel so small as the English

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada is not really a place where you are encouraged to have large spiritual adventures

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: Only a fool expects to be happy all the time

Quote.Author: Robertson Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: Fanaticism is overcompensation for doubt

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I have Spanx on. Always! I have to wear them all the time!

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up very fast as a young girl, but I grew slowly into my womanhood

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned about men from my son

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to get out of L.A., but time passes, and you find excuses to stay

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a hedonist when it comes to culinary delights

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning what you don't want is how you know what you do want

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always been a good mimic

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't stop moving. I'm like this weird insect. I can't sit still in real life

Quote.Author: Robin Wright
Quote.QuoteValue: If you get enough sleep, cut back on cigarettes and red meat, you look better the next day

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: There are worse things than being called 'the camel lady,' I suppose

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be bored; I don't want to be with someone I don't respect

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: Camels are wonderful animals. Witty, intelligent and sensitive

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of the best conversations I've had are sitting around a camp fire

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: I do believe that the genre reached its peak before the First World War

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: You apply the skills you use to produce your own book to make an anthology. Shaping. Rhythm

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't see myself as a travel writer. I can't. I don't

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a lot of writers are unrealistic about having their books translated into film

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are fragmented and uncertain, it is terrifying to find the boundaries of yourself melt

Quote.Author: Robyn Davidson
Quote.QuoteValue: Think for yourself. Act for yourself. Find out what you're capable of

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, with suits and clothes, if you keep them long enough, they all come back in fashion

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: You shouldn't be in the music business if you're posing

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I've tried many other hairstyles, but it just doesn't work

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a rock star because I couldn't be a soccer star

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: Fast cars like Porsches and Ferraris - they are things of beauty

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm proud to be a railway modeler

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I can definitely say the older I've got the better I've become at being a dad and a husband

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: My big brother still thinks he's a better singer than me

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be with one of the most beautiful women in the world and still be unhappy

Quote.Author: Rod Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I see myself at 7:30 in the morning and it's not too pretty

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: People, I just want to say, can we all get along? Can we get along?

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody can get bigheaded once they know the seat cannot be pulled out from under them

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: As a black man, you run from the cops. It's different now, but back when I was coming up, you run

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: It's happening right now... it's just not on film, it's not being recorded

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: Can we all get along?

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw my hometown burning that day

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble that they see me in is a part of my life that I'm working on

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not painful to relive it. I'm comfortable with my position in American history

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell myself time heals. It really does

Quote.Author: Rodney King
Quote.QuoteValue: What I've learned to do is arrest my addiction - arrest it myself, so I don't get arrested

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not programming to conservatives. We're just not eliminating their point of view

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: You never pull the trigger until you know you can win

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: I only understand friendship or scorched earth

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: Television and I grew up together

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a soft spot for Joe Biden. I like him. But he's dumb as an ashtray

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a - deep down, underneath all the work I do, I think there's a laziness in me

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: I think almost everything in life is life-experience, personality-driven

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: I quit politics because I hated it

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: The press is supposed to watch the powerful. And not throw in with them

Quote.Author: Roger Ailes
Quote.QuoteValue: The news business is simple, but it's not easy to do well

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: You're better off being a brick layer if you're going to play guitar than a sheet metal worker

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know many singers who actually do like the sound of their own voice

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: But contrary to what some people seem to think, I was never a bully. I was just a hard man

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope I die before I get old

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always felt that music is an art form that deserves to live the life of the artist

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't retire

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what people say about me

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I know my faults, but I'm comfortable with me

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not always the most diplomatic person

Quote.Author: Roger Daltrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never wanted to be anyone other than who I am

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: Your intellect may be confused, but your emotions will never lie to you

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing ever seems straightforward in Venice, least of all its romances

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: It's rare to find a film that goes for broke and says, 'To hell with the consequences.'
